description.oldValue:
,We are adding the ability for an SMTP domain to be shared across multiple Exchange Online tenants. This is particularly beneficial for organizations that undergo mergers, acquisitions and divestitures, as it allows users in more than one tenant to to receive email for the same email domain.
More info: https://aka.ms/admin1002
description.newValue:
,[This item is being postponed indefinitely.] We are adding the ability for an SMTP domain to be shared across multiple Exchange Online tenants. This is particularly beneficial for organizations that undergo mergers, acquisitions and divestitures, as it allows users in more than one tenant to receive email for the same email domain.
More info: https://aka.ms/admin1002
